title: Unlock Wellness at the Chinese Acupuncture and Herbs Center
description: Find your path to wellness at the Chinese Acupuncture and Herbs Center in Maspeth, NY. Experience the transformative power of holistic healing.
cleaned_text: WELCOME to Nature Points Acupuncture & Herbs Visit us at Visit us at Acupuncture returns the body to its natural harmonious state. It can provide many options where Western medicine falls short. Especially in the case of women's health, acupuncture and herbs can be quite effective with uterine fibroids, diminishing cysts, menopause relief and IVF success. Throughout history, herbal remedies were used to heal and balance the body. Unlike most pharmaceuticals and even herbal remedies found in health food stores, Chinese herbal prescriptions from a licensed practitioner are customized for the patient according to their individual needs and diagnosis. Herbal medicine may be suggested for a patient in conjunction with acupuncture treatments or patients can work solely with herbal medicine. Cupping is an adjunctive technique used in acupuncture treatments It has been used in traditional medicine for thousands of years. Cupping has roots in the Middle East, Asia, Northern & Eastern Europe and North American traditional peoples. Cups can be made from glass, bamboo, shells, and nowadays
